org.contentmine.pdf2svg

Class PDFGraphics2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Graphics
      • java.awt.Graphics2D
        • org.contentmine.pdf2svg.PDFGraphics2D

  • public class PDFGraphics2D
extends java.awt.Graphics2D
    a graphics2D for PDFBox applications to write to traps all Java2D graphics calls mainly diagnostic - if pdf2svg is comprehensive, these methods should not be required a new PDFGraphics object is created to capture glyphVectors
